name: Jotaro Shobo
description: Jotaro Shobo(Japanese: 正法 承太郎) is a high-ranking member of theTyger Claws, owner ofKabuki'sHo-Ohclub and a notoriousXBDscroller with at least seventeen murders to his name. Jotaro is considered to be one of the worst people inNight City. His strategically cold way of handling business and ferocious respect of the gang code allowed him to progress quickly up the ranks. His orders are authoritatively inflexible while he makes certain each job is executed accurately and on time, as to never leave the superiors waiting. This stringent devotion to the process and persistent incoming profit...
